"FTC OpMode Tuner is an OpenFTC project. Check out the OpenFTC organization on GitHub for more cool projects like this one!"
Thanks for downloading FTC OpMode Tuner!\n\nFTC OpMode Tuner allows you to tune parameters in your OpModes (such as PID coefficients or servo positions) in REAL TIME.

You add fields (variables) to the UI in this app. Those fields are then sent over the network to the RobotController, where a network callback is listening for them. Each field is identified with a tag, similar to the HardwareMap.
For more details, please see the About screen.
Please visit openftc.org/opmodetuner on your computer for setup instructions.

Looks like this phone is a Driver Station. This app won\'t work properly if the DS app is connected to the RC in background.\n\nAlso, please note that DS app must be open in the foreground to keep an OpMode running, so you will need a third phone in order to use this tuner.
Are you sure you want to clear all fields?
Are you sure you want to remove field \'%s\' ?
Wi-Fi radio off or not connected to an infrastructure mode network
Min cannot be greater than max!
You probably don\'t want the interval this high...
